header_text: You are looking to downsize because all of your children have left home. A social worker recommends that you should consider a home that will support your safety as your HD eventually progresses. You feel sad as you think about this possibility.

elements.text: The social worker reminds you that being prepared will not cause PD to progress any faster. You decide that planning for the future is...
